text: The 2016–17 National Basketball League (Bulgaria) season was the 76th season of the Bulgarian NBL. The season started on October 14, 2016 and ended on May 30, 2017. ==Teams== Chernomorets resigned from the league due to financial difficulties. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" |- !
